statement:
If the of the power series $\sum_{n=0}^\infty a_n(z-z_0)^n$ and
$\sum_{n=0}^\infty b_n(z-z_0)^n$ are positive and the sums of the series
are equal in infinitely many points which have $z_0$ as an accumulation
point, then the both series are identical, i.e. $a_n = b_n$ for each
$n = 0,\,1,\,2,\,\ldots$
